entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
